# Pull Request

## Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the changes made in this pull request.

## Type of Change
Select all that apply:

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Packaging change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor or cleanup
- [ ] Other (describe below)

## Related Issues
Link any related issues or discussions (e.g., #123).

## Testing Performed
Describe testing performed to verify functionality.  
Include commands, logs, or steps if applicable.

## Impact
Explain any potential impact on:
- System stability
- Packaging
- Desktop environments
- Installer or build processes (if relevant)

## Checklist
- [ ] My changes follow the project's CONTRIBUTING.md guidelines
- [ ] My code is licensed under GPL-3.0 or a compatible license
- [ ] I have tested my changes
- [ ] Documentation has been updated if necessary

## Additional Notes
Include any extra details relevant to the pull request.
